data.title: Dublin Aquatic Center, CA
data.meta_description: The Wave is a boardwalk themed swimming facility and entertainment complex anchored by a Natatorium for year-round swimming lessons, exercise programs, and recreational use.
data.text:
The Wave Waterpark is NOW OPEN for the 2024 Summer Season!

Hours of Operation:

May 25 - May 27, 2024: Saturday - Monday, 11:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. (CLOSED May 28 - May 31)

June 1 - August 2, 2024: Monday - Sunday, 11:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m.

August 3 - September 2, 2024: Saturday - Sunday, 11:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. (LAST DAY of Waterpark Operations is Monday, Labor Day, September 2)

Purchase waterpark tickets and reserve loungers and cabanas!

Safety is #1!

The Wave features state-of-the-art water treatment, and our lifeguards and slide attendants are Red Cross-certified to ensure safe, clean fun for everyone. Flotation devices brought into the park must be non-inflatable, Coast Guard-approved devices. A dedicated First Aid Room is accessible off the Waterpark deck by the Natatorium.

Air Quality Policy

The Wave operates as long as Air Quality is 149 AQI or below according to AirNow.Gov. If the air quality index score reaches 150 or above outdoor operations will cease and only the Natatorium will open for Recreational Swimming.

Photography Release:

While visiting The Wave, I understand that photographs may be taken of me or my child during the course of said activity, and that these photographs may be used in the City of Dublin’s publications, including but not limited to recreation brochures, the City’s website, and the City’s Facebook page or other City social media sites.
